allow: Bash(for file in index.html about.html contact.html srilanka-destinations.html customize-your-trip.html rent-a-car.html sri-lanka-tour-packages.html)
Bash(then echo "ISSUE: $file still contains old branding")

Bash(for file in jewels-of-ceylon-grand-tour.html ceylon-discovery-explorer.html buddhist-cultural-visit.html cool-relaxing-visit.html paradise-coastal-adventure.html sacred-ceylon-wellness-retreat.html)
Bash(for file in index.html about.html contact.html customize-your-trip.html rent-a-car.html sri-lanka-tour-packages.html srilanka-destinations.html)
Bash(then if grep -q "Marshel Tourism\|Marshall Holidays\|Marshe Holidays" "$file")
Bash(do if grep -qi "Marshe Holidays\|Marshel Tourism\|Marshall Holidays\|Marshall Tourism" "$file")
